message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly special. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $90. Can you consider that?

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to make an offer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $110, considering the product's value and uniqueness.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you consider $100 for the product?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $115.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. Would you consider $105 for the product?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $110. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'm offering it to you for $110. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you consider $108 for the product?

I'm not willing to budge any further, Bob. I've already made a final offer, and I'm not going to go any lower. I think we've reached a fair price, but if you're still not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
